# DeskPilot (v1)

## Requirements
- Windows
- Java 17+ installed (tested with Java 22)

## Commands
From this folder:

### Health check
deskpilot doctor

### Smoke demo (DeskPilot Demo App)
deskpilot smoke demo

### Record locators and generate a runnable test
deskpilot record

### Run a generated test
deskpilot run io.deskpilot.tests.generated.<YourTestClass>
